profiles.name: Clopse
profiles.cta: The base is on fire, the Commander is almost dead, but he’s still fiddling with a bomber somewhere to get the perfect bombing run. Will need you to build an economy for him because he’s not going to have the time, not with that bomber to fiddle with.

profiles.name: FerretMaster
profiles.cta: No, not a weasel, he’s the cute not-a-weasel-but-really-similar-and-who-knows-the-difference-anyway one. But he’s not just one ferret, he is the lord of ferrets. Help him unleash cute, furry hordes upon his enemies with a donation of Booms. Tens of Booms. Maybe one hundred.

profiles.name: Anonemous2
profiles.cta: The sheep amongst the wolves. They proved themself the strongest sheep, but will that help them? No. The answer is no. Send them the aid they need quickly before they get stomped in the first five minutes.

profiles.name: TheIban
profiles.cta: A FFA is won by the individual who looks least threatening, and no one looks less threatening than this. Throw some units his way to get him the attention he doesn’t want.

profiles.name: NimzoDragonLord
profiles.cta: He listens to classical music, evidencing a level of sophistication beyond your apish ways. Allow just a little of that class to rub off on you through a donation, and see him time the destruction to Mars the Bringer of War.

profiles.name: Quaatal
profiles.cta: Described by friends as “frequently seen playing the game”. That’s the best you got? Terrible friends. Kickstart this man’s self-esteem with a Catalyst and make him the destroyer of worlds.

profiles.name: Sinoccence
profiles.cta: He has sin in his name, so that’s how you know he’s a bad boy. Or something. Look, what do you want from me? It’s for a charity for God’s sake, donate the man some units!

profiles.name: ThatSonOfABroom
profiles.cta: Let him teach you the ways of PA, how to expand, how to produce, how to raid. Want to learn more? Why then, donate the unit you wish to see demonstrated and let him show the way of the true PA master. Or learn from his mistakes.

profiles.name: KillerKiwi
profiles.tagline: Might not actually be a kiwi
profiles.cta: Map connoisseur. May not have time to build anything due to typing into ALL chat the problems they have with the system design. Send units to help them demonstrate those problems.

profiles.name: Smurf
profiles.cta: Don’t let the terrible name fool you, this man knows his Planetary Annihilation. Rarely found playing under his own name, donate to honour him finally revealing himself for once. If he plays as blue though you should donate to his opponents to show what you think of that lame a reference.

profiles.name: MattShadowing
profiles.cta: Strapping on his big boy pants, he’s new to the world of the uber division. The light of hope shines in his eyes, and the power of friendship runs through his veins. But better to have the power of a Thor for annihilating his enemies paid and delivered to his door.

profiles.name: VioletAnia
profiles.cta: Embarrassing the young players of PA with her stories of “when I was uber rank”, she needs all the help she can get. Failing to make it through the first round last year despite massive donations, the challenge is on to find exactly how much money is needed to overcome her skill at claiming defeat.

profiles.name: NikolaMX
profiles.cta: Nik is of clan Nik. Naming a clan after himself should tell you everything you need to know about the confidence levels in play. Whatever you give, he will show you how to BM an opponent with it and still claim victory.

profiles.name: MarechalGryzzly
profiles.cta: Every time Nik loses a game he has a new excuse. Lag? Check. Spilled drink? Check. Misclick? Check. Trash panda attack? Check. Donate to France’s #1 player, defeat Nik, and discover new excuses together.

profiles.name: N30n
profiles.cta: So bad at the game he wrote a balance mod specifically to ensure his dominance in some arena. Probably doesn’t know what half the units even do anymore. Send nukes, because he might remember how to use the attack command still.

profiles.name: Diskraip
profiles.cta: They said you couldn’t turtle in PA. He proved them wrong and dominated the ladder, leaving opponents feeling guilty, sad and depressed. Donating to him is trolling the enemy, and you wouldn’t want to troll, would you?
